text:
e="preserve">Donald Pellmann (August 12, 1915 – October 11, 2020) was an American centenarian multi world-record-setting masters athlete. He was born in Milwaukee, Wisconsin.
Pellmann held the current M90 world record (for men aged 90 or above) in the long jump, high jump, discus throw, and indoor pole vault.
He participated in the 100 metres, triple jump, shot put, and javelin throw.
Pellmann died on October 11, 2020 in Santa Clara, California from problems caused by a broken hip at the age of 105.
